add_entrypoint_object(
  creat
  SRCS
    creat.cpp
  HDRS
    ../creat.h
  DEPENDS
    libc.include.errno
    libc.include.fcntl
    libc.src.__support.OSUtil.osutil
    libc.src.errno.__errno_location
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  open
  SRCS
    open.cpp
  HDRS
    ../open.h
  DEPENDS
    libc.include.errno
    libc.include.fcntl
    libc.src.__support.OSUtil.osutil
    libc.src.errno.__errno_location
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  openat
  SRCS
    openat.cpp
  HDRS
    ../openat.h
  DEPENDS
    libc.include.errno
    libc.include.fcntl
    libc.src.__support.OSUtil.osutil
    libc.src.errno.__errno_location
)
